duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform occupational health care activities, including health and wellness training and education, employee health services, and compliance.
Help determine what employees can do under restrictive duty, when they can return to work, and when to refer them to an outside medical provider.
Develop, formulate, and implement plans of care based on standard order and medical directives.
Treat, evaluate, and assess employee illness or injury and determine medical direction.
Assist in designing and executing employee health and wellness programs using technical knowledge and training.
